mapper.select: select A.CONTENT_DIV as contentDiv , A.MOVIE_KOR_TITLE as mainSubject , A.CONTENT_SEQ as contentSeq , mi.FILE_NM as imgFileNm , mi.FILE_PATH as imgFilePath from (select cm.CONTENT_DIV, mm.MOVIE_KOR_TITLE, cm.IMAGE_SEQ, cm.DISPLAY_ORDER, cm.CONTENT_SEQ from CONTENT_MASTER cm , MOVIE_MASTER mm where cm.PAGE_ID = 1 and cm.USE_YN = 'Y' and cm.CONTENT_SEQ = mm.MOVIE_ID) A , MOVIE_IMAGE mi where A.IMAGE_SEQ = mi.IMAGE_SEQ order by A.DISPLAY_ORDER
